trans-unit.source: Windows 10 for the enterprise: Ways to use devices for work | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 for the enterprise: Ways to use devices for work | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Provides an overview of deploying Windows 10 devices for enterprises, contrasting the different ways a device can be provisioned and used in an enterprise.
trans-unit.target: Provides an overview of deploying Windows 10 devices for enterprises, contrasting the different ways a device can be provisioned and used in an enterprise.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 for the enterprise: Ways to use devices for work
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 for the enterprise: Ways to use devices for work

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 provides you the ability to leverage Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 provides you the ability to leverage Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 devices can be connected to Azure AD, and users can sign-in to Windows with Azure AD accounts or add their Azure ID to gain access to business apps and resources.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 devices can be connected to Azure AD, and users can sign-in to Windows with Azure AD accounts or add their Azure ID to gain access to business apps and resources.
